name: A Place Unknown: The missing world (beta)
name_original: A Place Unknown: The missing world (beta)
description:
Another place; another world.... A world forgotten by man.

Welcome to "A place unknown: the missing world", a Text Adventure by Fennecai Fox Creative.

You awake locked in a small padded cell with nothing more than the clothes on your back and an empty backpack...soon, you discover that you have been transported to a world forgotten by mankind. Surrounded by a decaying overgrown city, you wonder, "Where is everyone?"

This is a text-adventure I have been creating in some form for a few years now; and I am still re-writing it to this day as one of my many projects.

The more people support this game (not just through purchases, but through comments and other forms of appreciation), the more likely it is that i will finish it, but for now, I am putting it online for a low price in hopes to gain some support for this game and other projects of mine.

Although there may still be typos, minor grammatical issues, and mis-spellings throughout this story, I hope you will enjoy it nonetheless. Currently, the story is not finished- It has merely begun, and i have several ideas for it's future. but that said; I would greatly appreciate any feedback you may have on how anything can be improved. If you see a mistake in grammar, punctuation, spelling, or anything else of the sort, please do not be afraid nor hesitate to leave a comment or contact me so I can work on improving this game. This doesn't just apply to the story itself; but also the design of the interface- I realize that its currently not the best, but your support will greatly motivate me to do better.

To see more of what I do, take a look at my website:

https://1995aek.wixsite.com/fennecaifox
